mapper.select:
select oi.id, oi.offices_name, oi.hospital_name, oi.doctor_num, oi.offices_honor, oi.offices_equipment, oi.offices_about, oi.offices_diagnosis_scope, oi.hospital_id, hi.hospital_name, hi.hospital_img, hi.images as images from office_info oi left join hospital_info hi on (hi.id = oi.hospital_id) where 1 = 1
AND oi.offices_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{officeInfo.officesName},'%')
AND hi.hospital_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{officeInfo.hospitalName},'%')
AND oi.offices_diagnosis_scope LIKE CONCAT('%',#{officeInfo.officesDiagnosisScope},'%')
order by oi.offices_name desc
